person.persName: Benjamin Flanders Burba (Green and LaRue County, Kentucky, carpenter and postmaster.)

body.p: Green and LaRue County, Kentucky, shoemaker, cabinet workman, and postmaster. Hardin County, Kentucky, native. Son of Scammel Burba and Lydia Flanders Burba. Married to Mary E. Rodman Burba in LaRue County, Kentucky, on November 13, 1856. Father of William R. Burba, Martha W. Burba, and George F. Burba. Shoemaker in LaRue County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1856. Cabinet workman in Green County in 1860. Postmaster for Hodgensville in LaRue County from February 3, 1863, to November 29, 1864.
